packageDetails: Explore the depths of the Amazon Rainforest on this 7-day guided expedition. Experience jungle trekking and canoeing while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.

Experience the wilds of Tanzania on this 14-day guided safari. Enjoy game drives and camping while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.

Explore the beautiful Maldives on this 7-day island hopping tour. Enjoy snorkeling and diving in the crystal clear waters while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.

Experience the rich culture of Japan on this 14-day guided tour. Visit traditional temples and gardens and learn about the history and customs of the country. All meals and accommodations are also included in the package.

Explore the vast and remote wilderness of Antarctica on this 21-day guided tour. Visit research stations and observe the unique wildlife of the continent. All meals and accommodations are also included in the package.

Experience the rugged beauty of Alaska on this 7-day guided wilderness adventure. Enjoy hiking, camping, and fishing while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.

Experience the beauty and culture of the Mediterranean on this 14-day cruise. Visit multiple ports and islands, and enjoy all the amenities of the ship. All meals and accommodations are also included in the package.

Experience the thrill of New Zealand on this 14-day guided adventure. Enjoy hiking, bungee jumping, and skydiving while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.

Explore the depths of the Peruvian Amazon Rainforest on this 7-day guided adventure. Experience jungle trekking and canoeing while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.

Experience the unique wildlife of the Galapagos Islands on this 14-day guided safari. Enjoy island hopping and observing the diverse species while being provided with all necessary equipment and meals. Accommodations are also included in the package.
